name: Canberra Cycling Club
tagline: Ride with Passion, Compete with Pride
description: The Canberra Cycling Club is dedicated to promoting cycling in the Canberra region through social riding and competitive events. With a variety of programs and support for cyclists of all levels, we aim to foster a vibrant and inclusive cycling community.

content.heading: Welcome to Canberra Cycling Club
paragraphs: Join us in exploring the beauty of Canberra through cycling. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced cyclist, we have something for everyone!

content.heading: Join Our Rides
paragraphs: Participate in our weekly rides and events designed for cyclists of all levels. Experience camaraderie and the joy of cycling in stunning Canberra scenery.

content.heading: Our Mission
paragraphs: Our mission is to encourage and support cycling in Canberra, providing opportunities for personal growth and competitive success.
We celebrate the spirit of cycling through community events and by fostering an inclusive environment for all cyclists.

content.heading: Our History
paragraphs: Established in 1994, Canberra Cycling Club has grown into a thriving community of cyclists. We aim to bring people together through cycling and enhance the local cycling culture.

content.heading: Become a Member
paragraphs: Join us and gain access to exclusive benefits, including discounts on events, merchandise, and more!
Membership options include individual, family, and junior categories to cater to all cycling enthusiasts.

content.heading: Sign Up Today!
paragraphs: Ready to ride? Complete our easy online registration to become a part of our vibrant community today!

content.heading: Upcoming Events
paragraphs: Stay tuned for our exciting lineup of events, including races, charity rides, and community gatherings. There's always something happening at Canberra Cycling Club!

content.heading: Event Calendar
paragraphs: Check out our calendar for dates, locations, and details on all upcoming events. Join us and meet fellow cycling enthusiasts!

content.heading: Get in Touch
paragraphs: Have questions or comments? Reach out to us and we'll be happy to assist you!

content.heading: Stay Connected
paragraphs: Follow us on our social media channels for the latest news and updates on cycling in Canberra.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Joining the Canberra Cycling Club has been one of the best decisions of my life! The community is welcoming and the rides are always a blast.

testimonials.name: David Lee
testimonials.text: The club has helped me improve my skills tremendously while providing a great support network during competitions.

services.title: Group Rides
services.description: Join our regular group rides designed for cyclists of all skill levels. Experience the joy of cycling in a supportive environment.

services.title: Coaching & Training
services.description: Receive tailored coaching and training programs to help you reach your cycling goals, whether for competition or recreation.

footer.description: Canberra Cycling Club - Where passion meets performance. Join our family of cycling enthusiasts.
